posts.title: Happy Founder's Day!
posts.excerpt: Today the chapter is celebrating 158 years of the Pi Kappa Alpha International Fraternity. The active brothers are participating in their annual Hot Dog eating contest. We welcome all alumni to attend!

posts.title: Fall Gamma Omicronicle
posts.excerpt: The most recent Gamma Omicronicle has been sent out to the emails we have on file through myPIKE. If you believe you didn't receive one, please make sure your myPIKE information is up to date.

posts.title: in Memory of Philip Vaughn
posts.excerpt: Philip Vaughn was very dedicated to the success of Gamma Omicron. He began the original Gamma Omicronicle Newsletter's and gathered tons of chapter memorabilia to put on display at varying GOAA events.
